definitions.definition: Something (such as an odor or perfume ) that is carried through the air.
A flag used to indicate wind direction or, with a knot tied in the center, as a signal; a waif , a wheft .
A loose noncommittal shot, usually played to a ball pitched short of length and well wide of the off stump.

secondary_definitions: Something (such as an odor or perfume ) that is carried through the air.
( nautical ) A flag used to indicate wind direction or, with a knot tied in the center, as a signal; a waif , a wheft .
( cricket , slang ) A loose noncommittal shot, usually played to a ball pitched short of length and well wide of the off stump.
